functional_areas.name: Planning and Scheduling
functional_areas.description: Covers strategic and operational planning of routes, service frequency, vehicle and crew scheduling, and run-cutting.

functional_areas.name: Operations Management
functional_areas.description: Encompasses real-time vehicle tracking, dispatching, service monitoring, and control center functions for day-to-day transit operations.

functional_areas.name: Customer Information and Engagement
functional_areas.description: Includes trip planning, real-time arrival information, service alerts, digital signage, mobile apps, and rider communication channels.

functional_areas.name: Fare Collection and Revenue Management
functional_areas.description: Involves fare media, mobile ticketing, contactless payments, account-based ticketing, fare policy enforcement, and revenue reconciliation.

functional_areas.name: Paratransit and Demand-Responsive Services
functional_areas.description: Supports eligibility management, trip booking, scheduling, dispatch, and service delivery for ADA paratransit and microtransit.

functional_areas.name: Asset and Fleet Management
functional_areas.description: Covers vehicle maintenance, asset tracking, parts inventory, lifecycle management, and condition-based monitoring of assets.

functional_areas.name: Safety, Security, and Incident Management
functional_areas.description: Addresses onboard surveillance, operator safety systems, incident response coordination, and emergency communication.

functional_areas.name: Human Resources and Workforce Management
functional_areas.description: Manages operator and staff assignments, rostering, timekeeping, labor rule compliance, and training.

functional_areas.name: Financial and Grants Management
functional_areas.description: Supports budgeting, financial reporting, grant tracking, and compliance with local, state, and federal funding requirements.

functional_areas.name: Performance Management and Analytics
functional_areas.description: Enables KPI tracking, service performance analysis, reporting, and continuous improvement across transit functions.

functional_areas.name: Technology Infrastructure and Systems Integration
functional_areas.description: Manages IT systems, data exchange, system interoperability, cloud services, and support for open standards.

functional_areas.name: Policy and Regulatory Compliance
functional_areas.description: Ensures adherence to accessibility, equity, environmental, and transportation regulations at all jurisdictional levels.

functional_areas.name: Mobility as a Service (MaaS) Integration
functional_areas.description: Facilitates interoperability with shared mobility services, integrated trip planning, booking, and payment across multiple modes.

functional_areas.name: Curb and Infrastructure Management
functional_areas.description: Oversees the use, reservation, and optimization of physical infrastructure such as curbs, stops, stations, and priority lanes.
